trans-unit.source: Provides an object list adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 為無線標記語言 (WML) 裝置配接器集提供物件清單配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The WML object list adapter uses secondary user interface (UI) features to render the control across multiple screens.
trans-unit.target: WML 物件清單配接器會使用第二個使用者介面 (UI) 功能，跨多個螢幕呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 具現化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the instantiated templates bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，執行個體化樣板便會繫結至可用的資料 (通常發生在第一次要求時)。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the templates do not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，樣板不會繫結至資料，而是依賴檢視狀態將資料填入 (通常發生在後續回傳時)。

trans-unit.source: Called by a control to create a templated user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 控制項會呼叫此方法來建立範本化使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: Name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已處理，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已處理，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific.
trans-unit.target: 收到回傳事件通知，檢查事件是否為特定的配接器時，是由控制項呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: the postback data is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 回傳資料無效。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> contains a command.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 包含命令，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an object list control contains a command; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件清單控制項包含命令則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> contains a default command.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 包含預設命令，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an object list control contains a default command; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件清單控制項包含預設命令則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if a details view of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 的詳細資料檢視存在，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a details view of an object list control exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件清單控制項的詳細資料檢視存在則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> contains a default command and no other commands.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 只包含預設命令而不含其他命令，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an object list control contains a default command and no other commands; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件清單控制項只包含預設命令而不包含其他命令，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode" /> for the control, and calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.PreShowItemCommands(System.Int32)" /> method on its <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode" />，並在其 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.PreShowItemCommands(System.Int32)" /> 上呼叫 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter.Control" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收輸出的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached, using the provided writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的寫入器，為附加控制項配接器的控制項，產生特定目標的標記。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: Renders the details of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現指定項目的詳細資料。

trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: Renders the menu of commands for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現指定項目的命令功能表。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Renders the menu of commands for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現指定項目的命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="Boolean" /> that indicates whether the list must be rendered as a table.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="Boolean" />，指出清單是否必須以資料表形式呈現。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list must be rendered as a table; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單必須以資料表形式呈現則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in order to change the manner in which the list view is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以覆寫，才能變更轉譯清單檢視的方式。

trans-unit.source: Even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter.ShouldRenderAsTable%2A> method returns `true`, the target device might not support tables, in which case the list view will not be rendered as a table.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter.ShouldRenderAsTable%2A>方法會傳回`true`、 目標裝置可能不支援資料表、 在此情況下的清單檢視將不會轉譯為資料表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter.ShouldRenderAsTable%2A> method returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the specified table will fit on the target device screen, whereas the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.Tables%2A> (inherited from <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>) of the <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities> class returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the device supports tables at all.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlObjectListAdapter.ShouldRenderAsTable%2A>方法會傳回`Boolean`，指出是否在目標裝置 畫面中，符合指定的資料表而<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.Tables%2A>(繼承自<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>) 的<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities>類別會傳回`Boolean`，指出裝置是否完全支援記憶體資料表。
